input.sentences: [male] arrived in the college town he 'll spend the next four years living in . he decided to take a walking tour .
he stopped at the statue in town square that is a tribute to veterans .
he found the bus stop that he 'll go to every morning on the way to class .
the old church was a mainstay in town with its impressive steeple .
exhausted | [male] returned to his house to begin unpacking .
